description.value:
[Slotless]

Prerequisites: Tier 4 with any faction, @Compendium[world.pathfinder-society-boons.1VWMLe12ZFqF9jah]{Expert Hireling}

Cost: 8 Fame

Effect: When you gain this boon, select one Hireling boon you possess that’s already been modified by the @Compendium[world.pathfinder-society-boons.1VWMLe12ZFqF9jah]{Expert Hireling}boon. The selected ally’s proficiency for their selected skills improves to master, and their modifier to skill checks increases to 6 + your level.

Special: You can purchase this boon multiple times. Each time you purchase this boon, you must apply its benefits to a different @Compendium[world.pathfinder-society-boons.1VWMLe12ZFqF9jah]{Hireling} boon.
